title: Serrated tussocks
creator_credit: New South Wales. Dept. of Agriculture
brief_description: Describes the damage done by serrated tussock in pastures and the difficulties in controlling it. Cultivation of competitive improved pastures and chemical treatment coupled with efficient farm management have proved successful.
